title: Shin Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji Mataiden
synopsis: Nazi Germany, 1944: As American bombers soar towards Berlin, a revolting Satanic rite takes place below—Hitler and his minions are using the monstrous Nazi Death Rape Machine to render the dimensional boundaries separating the Human World from the World of Man-Beasts and the World of Monster Demons. Dr. Munhihausen Sr.'s life work is about to come to fruition—the conjuring of the Overfiend!
related_anime: ['Urotsukidouji', 'Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji: Mirai-hen', 'Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji', 'Choujin Densetsu Urotsukidouji 2']
